headline: RBC Capital Raises its Price Target on Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (AMP) to $605 and Reiterates an Outperform Rating
summary: Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE:AMP) is included among the 10 Most Profitable Undervalued Stocks to Buy On February 2, 2026, RBC Capital analyst Kenneth Lee raised his price target on Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE:AMP) to $605 from $580 and reiterated an Outperform rating following the company’s fourth-quarter earnings report. RBC highlighted stronger-than-expected wrap flows in the Advice […]
